title: Cleaning
headline: A Simple, Flexible and Efficient Cleaning Service
intro: At Sahel, we provide a cleaning service that stands out for its professionalism and adaptability. Our experienced team is committed to meeting your expectations with total flexibility, whether you are present or not. We place utmost importance on safety and trust, ensuring strict access management and the protection of your belongings. Throughout our intervention, you benefit from personalized follow-up and transparent communication, so you can feel at ease at every stage. With Sahel, you can be confident that your space is in good hands, offering you complete peace of mind.

commitment.title: Strict Adherence to Our Service Charter
commitment.text: At Sahel, we strictly adhere to our own service charter, designed to ensure the highest quality cleaning services. This document clearly defines the standards and procedures we apply during each visit, ensuring a consistent and impeccable service. From the use of eco-friendly products to secure access handling, punctuality and quality client follow-up, every aspect of our work is governed by strict guidelines. By respecting this charter, we guarantee a professional cleaning service that meets your expectations, while ensuring total peace of mind.

specs.title: Service Specifications - Cleaning
specs.intro: Our cleaning service includes the following tasks, carried out with care and professionalism:

livingRoom.title: Living Room / Common Areas
livingRoom.point1: Dusting of furniture, shelves, and decorative items
livingRoom.point4: Cleaning of interior windows (reachable without special equipment)

kitchen.title: Kitchen
kitchen.point2: Sink cleaning and disinfection if necessary
kitchen.point3: Exterior cleaning of appliances (oven, microwave, refrigerator, etc.)
kitchen.point4: Sweeping and mopping of the floor

bathroom.title: Bathrooms / Toilets
bathroom.point1: Cleaning and disinfecting of sinks, faucets, and mirrors

bedroom.title: Bedrooms
bedroom.point3: Mopping of the floor if necessary
bedroom.point4: Tidying of laundry (basic folding on request)

extra.title: Additional Tasks
extra.point1: Cleaning of exterior windows (if safely accessible)

excluded.point1: Cleaning of windows or surfaces requiring specific equipment (ladder, lift, etc.)
excluded.point2: Heavy-duty cleaning (post-construction, fire damage, major water damage)
excluded.point3: Handling of chemical products not provided by the client (unless agreed in advance)
excluded.point4: Washing of delicate fabrics (silk, wool, etc.) or complex ironing
excluded.point6: Administrative or personal tasks (sorting mail, etc.)
excluded.point7: Cleaning of outdoor areas (terrace, garden, roof)
excluded.point8: Tasks involving risks (toxic mold, infections, hazardous materials, etc.)

conditions.point1: Valuable items must be secured by the client.
conditions.point2: Cleaning products and materials are included in the service.
conditions.point3: Cancellations must be reported at least 24 hours in advance.
